DOC.brief_summary: This single center non-interventional study healthy participant behavioral assessment fMRI assessment . The study consist 2 part . Part A involve 5 participant study implementation behavioral test identify potential issue . Part B involve 30 participant study test-retest reliability . Duration participation participant 30 day Part A ( 28 day screen period 2 day study visit ) 48 day Part B ( 28 day screen period 2 study visit 2 day separate period 14 day ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Non-interventional Functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( fMRI ) Study Behavioral Assessment Healthy Participants
DOC.criteria: Healthy participant , determine screen assessment principal investigator judgment A body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m^2 ) inclusive body weight range 50 100 kg The participant must able comply study requirement judge principal investigator Women participant postmenopausal surgically sterile agree use effective contraception throughout study Female participant childbearing potential positive blood pregnancy test Lactating woman participant Any history alcohol and/or drug abuse , addiction suspicion regular consumption drug abuse Use psychoactive medication , medication know effect central nervous system ( CNS ) blood flow Any contraindication magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) scan brain/head abnormality restrict MRI eligibility
